channel.title: [317][PI] Nyhex - Financed and looking for staff [PI][317]
channel.description:
Hello, I am Gypsy. I am creating a new server called Nyhex based off Project Insanity. It is a 317 and I am getting ready to pay for the VPS and Web hosting. I am in need of staff to help me code and work on the website. I have experience moderating and administrating several servers and I have a ton of ways we can make our server better than the top ones out there right now. I have gone to some of the top servers and checked out their servers to find our what their players want, and my plan is to give them what they want.
Positions Open:
1.Source Coder 2.Source Coder 3.Client Coder 4.Web Developer 5.Web Developer
Application Format:
Position you are applying for: Experience: MSN: Ventrilo (Y/N):
My MSN is gypsy.mm@live.com

item.title: [317][PI] Nyhex - Financed and looking for staff [PI][317]
item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

hmmm i was gonna apply for web designer…then Vain was here applying…vain you bastard taking all the spots…anyways if you despretly need a mid range web designer give me a call at dbartling@Hotmail.com (i rarely ever use this) or come to my server forums and check them out…
roidscape.darkbb.com
(note this isnt advertising it is showing my work)

btw this isnt just a website like webs.com where you can create your own forums for free…it was free but it was also long hours of recoding the formats and the buttons to the way i like them and the bar across the top…dont even start. it took 2months of 12 hours every day to code that bar so it wouldnt mess up

Read full topic
